title: One-Pot Spaghetti with Meat Sauce Recipe
description: This one-pot spaghetti dish is the perfect choice for an easy dinner. Everything is cooked together for dinner on the table in less than 45 minutes.
body: ​ Skip to content Allrecipes Search Please fill out this field. Search the site Please fill out this field. About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Main Dishes Pasta Spaghetti One-Pot Spaghetti with Meat Sauce 4.6 (71) 62 Reviews 9 Photos One-pot spaghetti puts Italian sausage, pasta sauce, and noodles together for a dish you can have on the table in less than 45 minutes. It doesn't get much easier than this by cooking everything in one pot. Switch it up by using ground beef, chicken, or turkey along with any other of your favorite ingredients, such as sliced mushrooms. Submitted by bdweld Updated on November 30, 2023 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 9 9 9 9 Prep Time: 10 mins Cook Time: 30 mins Total Time: 40 mins Servings: 4 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 4 servings 1 pound ground Italian sausage 1 small white onion, diced 4 cloves garlic, minced 1 (26 ounce) jar tomato-basil pasta sauce 2 cups water 1 teaspoon Italian seasoning 1 (8 ounce) package spaghetti noodles, broken in half ½ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese for serving (Optional) Directions Combine ground sausage, onions, and garlic in a large pot or skillet with tall sides. Cook over medium heat until sausage is cooked through, 5 to 8 minutes. Drain and discard grease. Stir pasta sauce, water, and Italian seasoning into the pot; bring to a boil. Stir in spaghetti noodles, return to a boil, and cook, stirring occasionally, until noodles are cooked through and sauce has thickened, 17 to 20 minutes. Serve topped with grated Parmesan cheese. Recipe Tip You can use mild or hot ground Italian sausage. I Made It Print Nutrition Facts (per serving) 606 Calories 27g Fat 66g Carbs 30g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 4 Calories 606 % Daily Value * Total Fat 27g 34% Saturated Fat 10g 51% Cholesterol 53mg 18% Sodium 1651mg 72% Total Carbohydrate 66g 24% Dietary Fiber 2g 9% Total Sugars 9g Protein 30g 59% Vitamin C 11mg 13% Calcium 217mg 17% Iron 5mg 27% Potassium 420mg 9% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. Add Your Photo Photos of One-Pot Spaghetti with Meat Sauce 01 of 09 Photo by  Allrecipes Member 02 of 09 Photo by  rory 07/05/2024 A keeper! Definitely a keeper! It is nice to only have to clean one pot. I love the versatility of the recipe. I added mushrooms and used bow tie pasta because that’s what I had in the pantry. I also used a jar of arrabbiata sauce instead of tomato basil. The family loved this pasta and wanted me to keep the recipe 03 of 09 Photo by  Leslie Ann 09/22/2022 I used beef instead of sausage. I scaled it down to 2 servings and used thin spaghetti. Still required more water. About a cup more. Took the same amount of time but it was tasty. My daughter loved it! 04 of 09 Photo by  Pecanpie 12/04/2021 Made a type of goulash with this recipe and it turned out great. I added about another half a cup of water. So much better not having to cook the noodles in a separate pot. 05 of 09 Photo by  Tina Ladd Brown 03/15/2021 06 of 09 Photo by  Tina Ladd Brown 03/15/2021 07 of 09 Photo by  Jim 11/21/2020 08 of 09 Photo by  Lyndsey Nix 10/27/2020 1 You’ll Also Love Maple Syrup-Glazed Bacon Breakfast Carbonara 1 Rating Camp David Spaghetti with Italian Sausage 192 Ratings Spaghetti Italian 179 Ratings Win's Shrimp and Spaghetti 125 Ratings Instant Pot Bang Bang Shrimp Pasta 22 Ratings Cajun Shrimp and Sausage Alfredo 1 Rating Ground Sausage Spaghetti 17 Ratings Creamy Pasta Primavera with Chicken and Sausage 1 Rating Italian Carbonara with Bacon 45 Ratings Creamy Shrimp Pasta Primavera 24 Ratings Enzo's Spaghetti all'Amatriciana 5 Ratings Spaghetti with Broccoli and Mushrooms 49 Ratings Speedy Spaghetti 64 Ratings Bang Bang Shrimp Pasta 8 Ratings One-Pot Taco Spaghetti 4 Ratings Shrimp Spaghetti in Olive Oil Dressing 14 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family. name: bdweld
instructions: Combine ground sausage, onions, and garlic in a large pot or skillet with tall sides. Cook over medium heat until sausage is cooked through, 5 to 8 minutes. Drain and discard grease.;Stir pasta sauce, water, and Italian seasoning into the pot; bring to a boil. Stir in spaghetti noodles, return to a boil, and cook, stirring occasionally, until noodles are cooked through and sauce has thickened, 17 to 20 minutes.;Serve topped with grated Parmesan cheese.
